title: Farrukh Habib asks opposition to submit details of ‘hidden accounts’
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Wednesday asked Pakistan Muslim League-N and Pakistan People’s Party for submitting documentary proofs of their hidden foreign accounts instead of criticizing government.
PTI has already submitted its donors’ bank account details to the Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP), he said while speaking to a private news channel.
He said the PPP and PML-N had taken funding from corrupt mafia and investigation would be held against them at any cost, adding, PML-N has hidden12 accounts and PPP had 7.
He said millions of transactions were made in the accounts of PML-N and PPP, and they must clarify their position in this regard.
Minister said both parties had committed crime by concealing their accounts from the ECP, adding, both parties also had no details of their donors.
